publications: [{"title":"Marking those on the move: Review of existing paradigm and towards a new framework","subtitle":"Centre for Public Policy Research Occasional Paper","date":"August 1, 2020","description":"This paper looks into multiple issues surrounding the internal migrants in India, recent developments and good governance practices, together with a review of the relevant events during COVID-19 and recommends a model towards a more comprehensive database and digital facilitation along with an integrated model for the welfare needs of migrants in India."}]

Analyzed the Indices on Municipal Performance and Ease of Living under the Smart City mission for Questionnaire design issues with 21 corrections2.
